name: HOMEBOUND (itch) (Teknik Labs)
description:
Find your way home in this emotionally charged and expansive new RPG from Teknik Labs. When a young child wakes up inside a new world named Talyx, they find themselves thrown into a massive adventure filled with quirky characters, limitless possibilities, and multiple endings all determined by the players choices. 

  • Take control of a character designed by you!
  • Adventure in an expansive RPG universe comprised of over 100 unique environments!
  • Be immersed in the beautiful world of Talyx with the original HOMEBOUND soundtrack.
  • Choices matter! With multiple unique endings, there is massive replay-ability and an engrossing story where your choices could determine the fates of characters, towns, and even parts of the universe.
